content: the winter snowfall hat is a ribbed beanie it is knit in the round from the bottom up with dk weight merino wool the hat is knit in 2×2 rib and has a folded brim the long-tail tubular cast-on is used for this hat this cast-on gives a rounded edge that is very stretchy and looks professional tubular cast-on takes more time and effort but if you wish you can use a standard long-tail cast-on the crown decreases are done gradually
